resources.string: Gp(Grade point)Calculator is an app developed as a hobby project for university students using (5.0) grading system in order to help students calculate their Gp effortlessly also students can edit their course entry details and use it to predict how their performance could be using different parameters. Tip: Long press on a course entry to edit details.

Abdulhameed Abdulhakeem a student of federal university of technology minna is a tech enthusiast, quite new in the android development sphere who loves to tinker around with new tools and technology to improve the society. you can contact me via the platforms below:
